name: Documents Clustering
short_description:
Each article keywords, article with the same keyword topics often overlap more than any other article subject, especially in the name of the article. Articles that share keywords, links with each other, the article does not have keywords that are not linked together.Number of jobs as much as they link it more closely. Each article we consider a node of the graph, each link is considered to be an edge of the graph, the similarity of the two articles is the weight of edges connecting the two articles.
MCL using Markov algorithm to perform clustering documents by the natural characteristics of the documents.
summary: Clustering documents based on graph of documents keywords
